name: BVRGER VAN
description:
You are the owner of your very own burger van where you can cook and serve food in amazing Virtual Reality compatible with both HTC Vive and Oculus Rift w/ Touch.

Simple controls make BVRGER VAN a great game for VR veterans as well as a great starting platform for the VR newbies.

Compete with friends to obtain the high score or battle yourself and see how long you can last.

Create your own journey in your path the burger van glory. Just remember, keep on flippin'!
